name: IntermittentPneumaticCompressionDevices(IPC)
title: Intermittent pneumatic compression devices (IPC)
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent intermittent pneumatic compression devices used for venous thromboembolism (VTE) prophylaxis. ),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Device. The intent of this data element is to represent the application of certain intermittent pneumatic compression devices. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with representing different types of intermittent pneumatic compression devices.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Intermittent venous compression system pump (physical object)
